'''''Azure Lantern, Jade Inkstone''''' is the [[Version 5.3]] original [[soundtrack]] album.

The album features five original tracks composed by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team for [[Lan Yan]]'s special EP and Version 5.3's [[Springtime Charms|Lantern Rite]].

It was released on February 12, 2025<ref>Twitter: [https://x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1889539931661541543 Genshin Impact's "Azure Lantern, Jade Inkstone" EP Album is now available.]</ref>
